projects.title: Simple Calculator UI

projects.title: Custom SMS API Solution

projects.title: IPTV Streamer App

projects.title: Urban AI – ChatGPT Integration

projects.title: Temporary Email System
projects.short_description: Create disposable email inboxes with APIs like 1secmail and mail.tm.

projects.title: HTML Encryption Tool
projects.short_description: Offline tool to encrypt and obfuscate HTML code.
projects.full_description: Encrypts HTML content for basic source code protection, aimed at creators who want to obscure their content. Works entirely offline.

projects.title: JSON to M3U Converter
projects.short_description: A conversion tool to generate M3U playlists from JSON IPTV data.
projects.full_description: Takes structured JSON channel data and turns it into valid M3U format playlists. Useful for IPTV devs or testers working on stream-based platforms.

projects.title: Password Generator (C++ UI)
projects.short_description: Secure password generator with GUI features and custom word options.

projects.title: SIM Toolkit Utilities (SimTools)
projects.short_description: A toolkit for SIM-based services like balance check, recharge automation, etc.
projects.full_description: Built for academic and telecom exploration, SimTools contains mini utilities to automate or simplify SIM card-related tasks (offline app).

projects.title: Interactive Weather App
projects.short_description: A weather app using location or city to fetch real-time data via API.
